fung_lam.name: Fung Lam
fung_lam.title: Developer Advocate
fung_lam.bio: Fung is an Android Developer. One of his recent app just reach 100,000+ installs and 4.7 stars under 400+ reviews.

emma_wong.bio:
Emma Wong is an experienced Android developer, have delivered over 20 mobile/web application projects, include awarded mobile apps with >1 Million users. She is the GDG HK organizer, and Womem Techmakers(WTM) HK Lead.
Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology.https://www.womentechmakers.com
emma_wong.shortBio: Emma Wong is the WTM Hong Kong Lead...
emma_wong.name: Emma Wong
emma_wong.title: Senior Software Engineer

kinni_mew.bio:
Kinni is the founder of Mindlayer, a Natural Language Processing startup solving the real world NLP tasks for the Chinese Languages. He leads the team to build NLP applications such as Text Classification, Sentiment Analysis, Dialogue System, Machine Comprehension, etc.
He is also one of the organizers of the GDG Hong Kong. He promotes machine learning to the community by giving talks, workshops and consultations.
kinni_mew.shortBio: Kinni is the founder of Mindlayer, a Natural Language Processing startup...
kinni_mew.name: Kinni Mew
kinni_mew.title: NLP Engineer

herbert_man.name: Herbert Man
herbert_man.title: Organizer
herbert_man.bio: 一名80後IT人及大學導師。主攻PWA/AMP及Android開發，現為GDG Hong Kong Organizer之一。自小與自然為伍，樂活在大自然中。對香港歷史有濃厚興趣，並喜愛找尋本土歷史。在港積極投入推動體驗教育、戶外學習，並將IT技術融入其中。

joe_kwong.shortBio: Harry Chan is currently a Product Manager at Mindlayer...
joe_kwong.name: Harry Chan
joe_kwong.title: Product Manager and NLP Engineer
joe_kwong.bio: Harry Chan is currently a Product Manager at Mindlayer. He received his B.Eng from City University of Hong Kong and was a grantee of Cyberport Creative Micro Fund after graduation. After being part of several startups and growth companies, Harry now oversees all incoming new products, solves product issues and along the way taught himself ML & AI. He is also part of our R&D team that brings together multiple people from different parts of the company to develop new innovative products.

ming_choi.shortBio: Derek is the Director & Co-Founder of Master Concept...
ming_choi.name: Derek Chan
ming_choi.title: Director
ming_choi.bio: Derek is the Director & Co-Founder of Master Concept

weiyuan_liu.shortBio: Danny is a Customer Engineer for Google Cloud, assisting Hong Kong...
weiyuan_liu.name: Danny Wong
weiyuan_liu.title: Customer Engineer, Google Cloud
weiyuan_liu.bio: Danny is a Customer Engineer for Google Cloud, assisting Hong Kong customers to transform and digitize their business with emerging technology of cloud, data, application and things in the digital era. He has 16 years of experience in enterprise networking, data center, security and collaboration technologies.

cyrus_wong.shortBio: Sharon is a customer-focused product and technology leader...
cyrus_wong.name: Sharon Anne Kean
cyrus_wong.title: Director of Product
cyrus_wong.bio: Sharon is a customer-focused product and technology leader, who's empathetic, enthusiastic and loves a challenge. She is currently Product Director at SEEK Asia where their vision is improving lives through better careers. Her past career has included stints at e-commerce and fintech start-ups in London, and has worked across product, design, data and technology.

jane_frieder.shortBio: Claudia is the founder of ChatCampaign - a next generation marketing CRM...
jane_frieder.name: Claudia Sin
jane_frieder.title: Founder
jane_frieder.bio:
Claudia is the founder of ChatCampaign - a next generation marketing CRM on messaging that helps marketers to understand their audience almost like their friends.
During her first year as CEO, she single handedly built the platform, acquired early corporate customers and got funding to scale up the company.
Before ChatCampaign, Claudia co-founded ShopLovers.co with 100,000usd turnover, 17,000 members and 20 suppliers across Asia when she was the CEO. She can do pitching, business development, UX design, develop software system and fight off hackers at the same time. She studied Computer Science and Engineering Enterprise Management at HKUST.

julia_tsoi.shortBio: Mary is currently a Java Developer Advocate for IBM's Digital Business Group...
julia_tsoi.name: Mary Grygleski
julia_tsoi.title: Developer Adcovate
julia_tsoi.bio: Mary is currently a Java Developer Advocate for IBM's Digital Business Group, specializing in Reactive Java systems. She has been riding the software tech waves since 1989, starting with Unix and C, then set sail for Java, open source, and web in the new Millennium, and now venturing into reactive, mobile, and the DevOps space. She now resides in the Greater Chicago area, and is an Executive Board member and the Director of Meetings for the Chicago Java Users Group (CJUG).

julius_uy.shortBio: Anson is a software developer at Oursky...
julius_uy.name: Anson Leung
julius_uy.title: Software Engineer
julius_uy.bio: Anson is a software developer at Oursky. Besides building mobile and web apps, he’s interested in software product design and machine learning.

george.shortBio: Ivan Ha is front-end leader of a product team in HK01...
george.name: Ivan Ha
george.title: Senior Software Engineer
george.bio: Ivan Ha is front-end leader of a product team in HK01. He participated in several development projects and recently move his focus to the company's main site. Ivan is passionate about the React ecosystem and always discussing new ideas with his teammates.

gap_lo.shortBio: Mike Leung is one of the lead engineers in the Video Product Team in HK01...
gap_lo.name: Mike Leung
gap_lo.title: Senior Software Engineer
gap_lo.bio: Mike Leung is one of the lead engineers in the Video Product Team in HK01. He has been working in the video industry for the last few years by using the web technology. Recently Mike is focusing on consolidating the video resource pipeline and improving the experience on video delivery.

ivan_so.shortBio: Serena Pau founded Groking Lab to harness her great passion in designing products...
ivan_so.name: Serena Pau
ivan_so.title: CEO and Founder
ivan_so.bio:
Serena Pau founded Groking Lab to harness her great passion in designing products that truly improve the way people live. She believes that making small changes in people’s lives creates large impact.
Ozmo is the first project launched by Groking Lab in 2015. Its mission is to inspire busy individuals to be aware of how important it is to their health and well-being to stay hydrated. Serena manages Groking Lab from Hong Kong in order to nurture the startup; she believes that staying close to the maker is important to the ultimate realization of the product.
Today Ozmo has users in over 85 countries. Serena is also serving as Entrepreneur in Residence at Nest.vc, hoping to inspire more people to become entrepreneur.

harshdeep_vaghela.shortBio: Mobile Engineering Manager (Android and iOS) at Red Soldier Limited...
harshdeep_vaghela.name: Roy Ng
harshdeep_vaghela.title: Mobile Engineering Manager
harshdeep_vaghela.bio: Mobile Engineering Manager (Android and iOS) at Red Soldier Limited

orix_auyeung.shortBio: Hong Kong Society of Autonomous Model Vehicles (SAMV) 香港自動駕駛模型協會...
orix_auyeung.name: Dennis Wu
orix_auyeung.title: SAMV
orix_auyeung.company: Hong Kong Society of Autonomous Model Vehicles
orix_auyeung.bio:
The goal of this group is to build a community of autonomous vehicle hackers who make and race autonomous RC cars on a budget. Small-scale remote control cars fill a critical need for applying Autonomous Vehicle technology to real world conditions while still being approachable for individual enthusiasts. We think this is the ideal platform for really getting your hands dirty with the array of skills needed to put an autonomous vehicle on the road. We also think it's just really cool! Join us and let's start hacking!
This group started as DIY Robocars HK and renamed to Hong Kong Society of Autonomous Model Vehicles (SAMV) 香港自動駕駛模型協會 because we want to expand into other types of vehicles, e.g. drones, boats.
